Pre-Game Insights: The Arizona Diamondbacks lead 1-0 in a four-game series against the Milwaukee Brewers.
The matchup Friday is the fifth time these teams square off this season. The season series is tied 2-2.
Brewers hitters have a collective.327 on-base percentage, the third-ranked percentage in the NL.
Diamondbacks hitters have a collective.441 slugging percentage to rank second in the NL.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Diamondbacks are 43-35 in road games and 85-68 overall.
The Brewers are 88-65 overall and 44-31 at home.
William Contreras leads the Brewers with a.280 batting average, and has 37 doubles, two triples, 22 home runs, 73 walks and 90 RBI.
Ketel Marte has a.289 batting average to lead the Diamondbacks, and has 21 doubles, two triples and 32 home runs.
Others: The Brewers' pitchers are Colin Rea (12-5, 4.14 ERA, 1.22 WHIP, 124 strikeouts) and Zac Gallen (12-6, 3.61 ERA, 1.28 WHIP, 140 strikeouts)
